pages.title: Merits
pages.ingress: At the end of the day, what you wan't to know is what can I do? Well, seek no further. Below follows my merits and capabalities.

p: Interfaces are viewed as controls to a computer program.
It's an accurate picture, of course, but the way I view it is different.
Software is not a monitor, mouse and a keyboard. It's a biological artifact, and the interface is the plug to our brain
Building Back-End services is a lot like orchestrating an Opera.
The pleasure is not in seeing people react to the things on stage.
Instead, the pleasure is found in knowing that everything works because you got it to work, and the less you hear about it, the better do you know you did.

pages.title: Xp
pages.ingress: In a minimal amount of time, I've gathered experience from a broad range of areas and grown throughout each challenge. Each month I look at my old code and marvel at how much I've learned.

p: I started at BobbyHouston at June, 2016 and kept on for the entirety of the summer.
As it was my first real programming job, the experience was intense and I built so many services and websites that I find it hard to even remember how I managed it.
TeddyBear Studio is building a Static Site Generator (SSG) and a Content Management System (CMS) service wrapped around it
In short, it's a combination between Wordpress and Wix.
Except, of course, with the beneficial speed of a static site.
I write, I code, I talk.
Do you need an article? Maybe a talk from a comedian or perhaps what you need is a motivational speaker?
In any case I view myself as a multi-talented Software Engineer and freelancing gives me the opportunity to hone into that.
I love technology.
I'd love to say 'I'm commited to this', but the truth is that it all derives from my curiosity and interest.
On top of that, I'm the type of guy who is able to pour down his soul on his work and obsessions.
If you're in need of an Engineer, take your shot and contact me ASAP. It will be too late.

pages.title: Contact
pages.ingress: Ready to take a step further in our relationship? Come on, now, don't be shy - we're a happy bunch and we'd love to hear from you! Pick your favorite channel from below and see you soon.
